UniqueKey - Annotation Type in things.model.types.attributes
Tags a type as one where there can be only ever one key with the same value.
UniqueKeyAsChild - Annotation Type in things.model.types.attributes
Tags a type as one where when a thing has got multiple childs of this type, all of those must have different keys.
UniqueValueForKey - Annotation Type in things.model.types.attributes
Determines whether all values of a type need to be unique.
UniqueValueForKeyAsChild - Annotation Type in things.model.types.attributes
Determines whether all values of a type need to be unique if they are children of the same parent and have the same key.
